Reviews.Title: Depends on what you want
Reviews.Author: Ichigo
Reviews.Content: I was wanting a wifi android phone, this was the cheap way to go.The phone is nice, pretty much does what I need, but it's a 'cheap version' of a android impo.It's not bad, but I would rather have a Samsung Note or Galaxy.Not much to say, it does what a phone should do, I just want something of more HQ. >_< Dropped lots of time and the screen has not shatterd yet, but I did sit my printer on it by mistake and cracked the screen some..

Reviews.Title: Recently Purchased
Reviews.Author: CLSUT
Reviews.Content: So far it has met my satisfaction and my current needs in a phone.Only drawback is that I have to charge it on a daily basis even though my usage is not that much.I would still recommend it to someone.

Reviews.Title: perfect!
Reviews.Author: LOLEE
Reviews.Content: The size was perfect great pictures and most of all you don't have to charge it every day. Great price!

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: olaiza pacheco
Reviews.Content: love u is the mejor product, is the more perfect, i like it mire thanks love u more you like

Reviews.Title: Huawei: Chinese Takeover Company
Reviews.Author: Everett
Reviews.Content: Huawei is owned by the Chinese government, so expect to be tracked. This phone is not very high quality, so I would recommend getting a phone made by a more trusted company. Do not buy this, no matter the price. It is what China wants.

Reviews.Title: ms.lin
Reviews.Author: sandi
Reviews.Content: I like this phone so much.it was brand new when I first brought it:-)so happy I got that phone It was fast and free shipping.the first time i order it .it only take 2-3 days to be here.was brand new too.I'm glad i didn't waste any money on that phone;-)hope u Guy like it too;-)
